attributes.title: Did I Stutter?
attributes.review:
Michael: Ener-gize…
Jim: You know what would energize me? If you, Pamela Morgan Beesly…
Pam: Don’t, don’t–
Jim: Would…
Pam: If you propose to me during a Michael meeting, I will say no.
Jim: Well, it’s too late, because I’m proposing… that you get me a cup of coffee, which would energize me greatly, and make me the happiest man in the world.
Michael: Everybody, so how are we going to energize our office? I mean, I haven’t done anything since Christmas. Pam, clearly, has just given up trying. So what we need to do is we get things going, we need to get percolating a little bit. Anybody have any ideas of what we could do. Any suggestions? Yes, Andy?
Andy: What if we changed our outgoing answering machine message, so it just had a little more… zing, and a little more pep?
Michael: Zing and pep, see that’s those are the kind of words we’re looking for. Yes, Jim?
Jim: What about if we did an even newer voicemail message that had even more zing and pep?
Michael: Now we’re cooking. I like this. Maybe a whole theme, like a rap. A rap rhyme…
Jim: An urban thing…
Michael: An urban, yeah, Stanley? You wanna help us out with that?… Stanley, earth to Stanley…
Stanley: Not me.
Michael: Yes you. Come on, Stanley, put your little game down and join the group.
Stanley: No.
Michael: Stanley, we’re havin a little…
Stanley: Leave me alone, dammit.
Michael: We’re havin a little brainstorm session…
Stanley: DID I STUTTER?
Michael: …Good, this is good. I’m going to grab a glass of water.

attributes.title: my daddy my superhero
attributes.review:
As a very proud trumpet I was compelled to install this app. How ever after using my daddy Dons app for a few minutes I began to get a horrible brain splitting headache then I believe I passed out. When I woke up there was a MAGA hat fused to my head even though I fully and unconditionally LOVE my cheeto dust covered baby Donald that didn’t mean I wanted a MAGA hat fused to my head!
Then my condition worsened I began to chant “Trump 2020” uncontrollably. Thats when I realized that it was the hat that was causing this madness! So I tried even harder to pry the hat off my head but it wouldn’t budge so I ended up having to BURN it off I now have no hair but at least I am not chanting that nonsensical slogan any longer. I then immediately deleted this pathetic excuse for an app. While my symptoms were mild my friends who downloaded this app said they experienced the following symptoms...

- uncontrollably buying trump murch
- skin slowly turning orange 
- lack of basic grammar and sentence stucture
- a worsening of vocabulary (not able to say big word)
- shrinkage of the penis
- strange attraction to underage females
-  fear of minorities and foreign languages 
- random misogynistic beliefs
- uncontrollably watching fox news on repeat
- severe insensitivity
- propagating fake news

These are some but not all of the consequences that come with this app CONSIDER YOURSELF WARNED!!! However since deleting this I have felt free and have learned to love everybody despite our differences. I am proud to say that I have since donated to the BLM movement and have been accepting of different people and different cultures.

✨🧚✨💫🌿🍃🌸💫✨
tried to use but the app was entirely in pig latin. is this a joke?
